components module¶

This module contains the initial functions for the battleships game

components.create_battleships(file_name: str = 'battleships.txt') → dict¶

Creates a dictionary of battleships from the given file

components.initialise_board(size: int = 10) → list¶

Initialises the board with the given size

components.place_battleships(board: list, ships: dict, board_data: list = None, algorithm: str = 'simple') → list¶

Places the battleships on the initialised board

components.validate_placement(direction: str, board: list, x: int, y: int, length: int) → bool¶

Checks if the placement of the battleships is valid on the board
